content: In addition, we experienced a decrease in the average exchange rate of the euro to the U.S. dollar, which lowered our fourth quarter 2022 product sales by approximately $865,000 such that on a constant currency basis, fourth quarter 2022 core non-COVID product sales were actually $8.5 million, which represents a 6.4% increase from our $8 million in core non-COVID product sales a year ago. The decrease in the average exchange rate of the euro to U.S. dollar, lowered 2022 product sales by approximately $3.1 million, such that on a constant currency basis, 2022 core non-COVID product sales were $32.2 million, a 5% decrease compared to $33.8 million in core non-COVID-19 product sales one year ago.
